timeline.bodyText: Nit - Why use main for creating the test connection? a bit odd because main will never do that?
timeline.author: shaguptashaikh

replies.bodyText:
No specific reason actually, I just used one valid component name from ipc.yaml.
@fahadmohammed01 Do you have any suggestions?
replies.author: hui-yang

replies.bodyText: Any valid component should work, TEST_SERVICE_NAME?
replies.author: fahadmohammed01
